Node.definition: = man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= large fortification; for the defense of a town; built of stone; could consist of one extra strong building or of a complex of buildings surrounded by its own strong wall; ≈ associated with protection and security and often used as an epithet for God

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to approach|to come near|to come forward
Node.definition: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

Node.gloss: to act wickedly|to do wickedness|to do evil
Node.definition: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
literally: to stumble; hence: = process by which humans do not live up to the expectations others have of them
= process by which humans or animals lose their balance while walking or standing and end up flat on the ground; ≈ associated with failure and loss of face
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: to set up (a tent)|to erect (a tent)|to encamp
Node.definition: = action by which an individual or group of people settles in a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose
literally: a camp; hence: = a relatively large group of people, such as nomads or soldiers, moving from one camping place to another

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which animals, humans, or deities do whatever is necessary to perform a particular event
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= action by which humans focus their eyes on someone or something in order to see it well
= state in which a deity has qualities that inspire love and appreciation
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which someone gives careful thought to a certain issue in order to make an informed decision
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
= causative action by which humans bring other humans to a particular location ► in order to keep them from danger

a shelter, ◄ made of fragile materials such as leaves and branches, ► for the purpose of protection from rain and sun for both humans and animals; used by people who needed a temporary shelter, such as nomads, soldiers, and farm workers in the field; ≈ by extension, figuratively God's protection over his people, God's shelter for himself; also a metaphor for Jerusalem, the dwelling of God's people; also by extension, a place where ferocious animals can hide in order to attack someone

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to go to a location where they will not be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them
= state in which people, animals, or objects are in a location where they cannot be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside
= mass of rock projecting and forming an elevation
= causative process by which humans take an object from a relatively low position and raise it up
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener

Node.gloss: to lift up (someone's) head > to restore (someone's) confidence
Node.definition: literally: to lift up (someone else's) head; hence: = causative process by which deities help humans to find new confidence

Node.gloss: one's head is lifted up > to look up with confidence
Node.definition: literally: (one's) head is lifted up; hence: = state in which humans can look up without shame
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
literally: to seek (someone's) face); hence: = action by which humans make an intensive effort to be in the presence of another human or deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: to seek (someone's) face); hence: = action by which humans make an intensive effort to be in the presence of another human or deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: to hide (one's) face (from someone); hence: = action by which a deity does not engage with people, and does not intervene neither in their favor nor to punish, ◄ as if he were enable to see them
literally: to turn (someone) away; hence: = action by which humans or deities show their unwillingness to help (other) humans
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= to accept a person or animal into one's home or community
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire knowledge, a skill, or a certain type of behavior
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= an area of fairly level, high ground; ≈ sometimes associated with a lack of obstacles, both literally and figuratively
= person with whom one is in conflict

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= action by which humans provide evidence or proof that something has taken place or that some decision has been made
literally: falsehood; hence: = state in which things that are being communicated are factually untrue

literally: to breathe out; hence: = action by which humans say malicious things, while their breathing shows their inner agitation and emotions|= a person who has evidence that something has taken place or that some decision has been made
= to behave aggressively towards someone with which one has a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another
= marker indicating that if the event in focus would not have been true another event would not haven taken place
= state in which humans are confident with regard to another person or event, which means that this person is believed to be speaking the truth, or that this event is true

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

Node.gloss: to look for|to wait for|to hope for
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else; as a result, they are willing to defer taking action for some time
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to be strong (mentally)|to be courageous|to stand firm|to be resolute
Node.definition: = state in which humans are mentally strong and able to deal with issues relating to good leadership, morals and ethics, war, and the supernatural world
= state in which humans help other humans to find the inner strength to face difficult circumstances; ≈ this can have both a positive (courage) and a negative (stubbornness) sense
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

Node.gloss: to look for|to wait for|to hope for
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else; as a result, they are willing to defer taking action for some time
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
